item.title: Idris Elba In Talks For Live-Action Masters Of The Universe Movie As Key He-Man Ally
item.description: The live-action Masters of the Universe reboot receives a major update with news that Idris Elba is in talks to play one of He-Man's key allies.

item.title: Tim Allen & Jamie Lee Curtis' Christmas Comedy With 5% RT Score Finds Streaming Success 20 Years Later
item.description: Tim Allen and Jamie Lee Curtis' Christmas comedy is finding streaming success 20 years after hitting theaters and garnering terrible critical reviews.

item.title: Wicked's 14 Wizard Of Oz Easter Eggs
item.description: Wicked features many overt references to The Wizard of Oz, but there are a variety of more subtle Easter eggs from the 1939 movie to be found.
